actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the donation of volunteer services to charitable organizations by allowing a deduction for the costs incident to such services.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for expenses incident to the performance of volunteer services for a charitable organization.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to encourage the donation of volunteer services to charitable organizations by allowing a deduction for the costs incident to such services.
